trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_SEQ_00<tab>Something seems to be weighing on Hermes's mind.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_TODO_00<tab>Search for Hermes.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Meteion and have her accompany you.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_TODO_02<tab>Search for Doros while accompanied by Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_EMETSELCH_000_000<tab>I'm tired. Leave me be.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HYTHLODAEUS_000_005<tab>I thoroughly enjoyed myself─at the end most of all!
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_010<tab>All the creations are happy. That makes me happy too!
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_020<tab>Tell me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. In the course of watching me, have you learned aught of value?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_Q1_000_021<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_A1_000_022<tab>Nothing so far, but I'm hopeful that will change.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_A1_000_023<tab>Dynamis─dynamis seemed promising.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_A1_000_024<tab>I'm not sure what I'm looking for, but I don't think I've found it yet...
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_025<tab>I see... If you told me what it is you seek, I would be able to better accommodate you.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_026<tab>Dynamis, you say? Curious that such an obscure phenomenon should be of interest to you.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_027<tab>If only my work were more interesting... Nevertheless, I'm still indebted to you for keeping Meteion company. If there is aught I might do, you need but ask.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_ANAGNORISISSTAFF04426_000_028<tab>Chief Hermes, what good fortune to find you here.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_029<tab>Is something the matter?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_ANAGNORISISSTAFF04426_000_030<tab>The lykaon─I'm afraid it's done it again.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_ANAGNORISISSTAFF04426_000_031<tab>No sooner did we release one for observation than it set upon the nearby okyupetes, slaughtering them.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_032<tab>Was the creature hungry? Or somehow provoked?

TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_ANAGNORISISSTAFF04426_000_033<tab>I had just fed them myself, and the okyupetes were keeping a wide berth. It is the nature of the lykaon that is to blame. Their innate viciousness.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_ANAGNORISISSTAFF04426_000_034<tab>Temperament aside, it is an outstanding creation, perfect in form and function.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_ANAGNORISISSTAFF04426_000_035<tab>Though it may not be suited for release, I've no doubt that the bureau will accept its concept for preservation.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_ANAGNORISISSTAFF04426_000_036<tab>In any case, there's no point in postponing the inevitable. Doros will revert them all once the paperwork is in order.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_037<tab>Where is the scene of the incident?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_ANAGNORISISSTAFF04426_000_038<tab>Just off the path to the Twelve Wonders. As you make your way, you should see it on the left. I don't know if Doros is still there, however.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_039<tab>H-Hermes! Wait!
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_EMETSELCH_000_040<tab>If this is part of his work, then I would observe. We follow.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_EMETSELCH_000_050<tab>A fearsome beast, this lykaon... But where is it now?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HYTHLODAEUS_000_055<tab>The okyupete is no easy prey. With its hooves and horns, it was designed to be formidable even on land.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HYTHLODAEUS_000_056<tab>Yet they didn't stand a chance against the lykaon...
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_060<tab>It's heavy... Hermes's pain...
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_070<tab>The lacerations and burns are unmistakable. A lykaon was indeed responsible.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_071<tab>But the creature is nowhere to be seen. Doros must have taken it away.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_072<tab>The man makes his base at the Twelve Wonders. I shall go and seek him out there.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HYTHLODAEUS_000_073<tab>Emet-Selch and I will search the area for good measure. Just to make sure the lykaon did not escape.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_074<tab>My thanks. Let us meet at the Twelve Wonders when you have finished.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_075<tab>I will go on ahead. Please follow with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_076<tab>Come, come. It's down this path and over the bridge.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_080<tab>There it is─the Twelve Wonders. Hermes is looking for Doros. Let's look for Doros too!
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_081<tab>He's a man with long, blond hair...I think. I'll know him when I see him!
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_SYSTEM_000_082<tab>Meteion is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_SYSTEM_000_083<tab>You can leave Meteion behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_SYSTEM_000_084<tab>If you wish to have Meteion accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_Q2_000_090<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_A2_000_091<tab>Talk.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_A2_000_092<tab>Part ways.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_A2_000_093<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_095<tab>Come on, let's find Doros. He's a man with long, blond hair...I think!
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_Q3_000_100<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Meteion?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_101<tab>All right! I'll wait in front of the Twelve Wonders.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_105<tab>Ready to look for Doros again? Let's go, let's go!
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>Meteion has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_THETWELVEWONDERSSTAFFA04426_000_120<tab>...Hm? May I help you?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>You recall that you do not actually know what Doros looks like. You should have Meteion accompanying you before initiating conversation.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_THETWELVEWONDERSSTAFFA04426_000_122<tab>...Hm? If you're with Meteion, then I assume you're on an errand for Hermes. What can I do for you?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_123<tab>S-Sorry, wrong person! We're looking for Doros...
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_THETWELVEWONDERSSTAFFA04426_000_124<tab>Ah, I see. We do have similar hair, so people often mistake us from afar. I hope you find him soon.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_THETWELVEWONDERSSTAFFA04426_000_125<tab>Don't worry, you're hardly the first ones to mistake me for Doros, and you certainly won't be the last.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_THETWELVEWONDERSSTAFFB04426_000_130<tab>Once I get back and record today's results, I should finally be able to put that report to bed...
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_THETWELVEWONDERSSTAFFB04426_000_131<tab>Once I get back and record today's results, I should finally be able to put that report to bed...
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_132<tab>Not Doros! His hair is long, but the color is wrong.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_THETWELVEWONDERSSTAFFB04426_000_135<tab>...Doros? I think he returned a short while ago.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>You recall that you do not actually know what Doros looks like. You should have Meteion accompanying you before initiating conversation.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_141<tab>Doros! That's Doros!
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_142<tab>Well now, if it isn't Meteion. What brings you here?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_143<tab>Ah, I thought I heard familiar voices!
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_144<tab>I didn't realize you two had decided to help me search for Doros. Thank you.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_145<tab>You're in charge of the lykaones, I believe. Where are they now?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_146<tab>(-Doros-)Out in the fields in restraints. Frenzied as they were, I couldn't well return them to Ktisis.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_147<tab>(-Doros-)Once I've submitted my report, I'll see them reverted without delay.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HYTHLODAEUS_000_148<tab>It's as he says. The beasts are indeed quite ferocious.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_149<tab>(-Doros-)Y-You're one of the Fourteen! Wh-What brings you here!?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_EMETSELCH_000_150<tab>Nothing you need concern yourself with. As you were.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_151<tab>We've heard the news─that a lykaon slaughtered okyupetes. As the observer in charge, you are of the opinion that they are not fit to be released?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_152<tab>(-Doros-)Aye, I am. Their abnormal aggression and exceptional strength makes for a highly problematic combination.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_153<tab>(-Doros-)It matters not where they are released. Lykaones would threaten other species and upset the natural order.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_154<tab>Could it be that the specimens observed are an outlier?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_155<tab>(-Doros-)Highly unlikely. We've created a good many of them; all exhibited the same tendencies.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_156<tab>(-Doros-)Even when we used Kairos to begin with a fresh slate, their behavior was unchanged.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_EMETSELCH_000_157<tab>Kairos...?
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_158<tab>(-Doros-)A memory reconfiguration system. The chief himself created it.

TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_159<tab>(-Doros-)It allows us to erase or alter memories, that we may observe creations in different environmental conditions without needing to remake them from scratch.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_EMETSELCH_000_160<tab>Quite impressive...and potentially dangerous. Depending on the intensity of the aetheric emissions, Pashtarot may wish to have words with you.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_161<tab>Rest assured I've kept all values within prescribed limits. And to prevent misuse, its applications are limited to those authorized by the chief overseer.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_162<tab>Do not misunderstand. To manipulate a subject's memories is an intrusive act I deeply abhor. But it is still preferable to execution.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_163<tab>(-Doros-)Come now, Chief, let's not be so melodramatic! What was born of aether is simply being reduced to its original state.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_164<tab>(-Doros-)I know the distinctions concern you, but we mustn't lose sight of the bigger picture─making rational choices for the sake of a more prosperous star.

TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_165<tab>(-Doros-)If a creation cannot be properly studied even with the aid of Kairos, we remake it. If a creation is deemed a detrimental existence, we unmake it. 'Tis all for the greater good, and none question the necessity of such routine processes.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_166<tab>I understand these things, I do. I would never think to unleash a clear and undeniable threat unto the world.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_167<tab>Yet insignificant though their individual lives may be next to all creation, it is all the lykaones have.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_168<tab>Before we seal their fates, we owe it to these beings to exhaust all options. To ensure that nothing has been overlooked.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_DOROS_000_169<tab>(-Doros-)If you insist. Let me provide you with a full report, and we may take it from there.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HYTHLODAEUS_000_170<tab>Would it be possible for us to attend the discussion? That Emet-Selch may better carry out his duties.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_171<tab>By all means.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_172<tab>Pray show them to the meeting room.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_HERMES_000_180<tab>We have a duty to the star, this I know. But it doesn't mean we don't also have a responsibility to the lives we bring into existence here.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_190<tab>To man, other beings are just things. To be used and controlled. Like magic.
TEXT_AKTKME108_04426_METEION_000_191<tab>That's what Hermes told me once...
